summary: Complete testing of Immobilier GIMO section - All 17 backend tests passed, all frontend features verified working. MOCKED: Payment processing is simulated (no real money transfer).

console_warnings.issue: React hydration warnings about <span> in <select>/<table> elements - these are development-only warnings from code instrumentation, not affecting production

backend: GET /api/properties returns paginated list with total and pages
GET /api/properties/:id returns single property with all details
POST /api/auth/register with role=agent creates agent account
POST /api/properties with agent token creates property
POST /api/payments creates payment with GIMO-XXXXX reference
frontend: IMMOBILIER nav link visible in header (data-testid=immobilier-nav-link)
/immobilier page loads with 'IMMOBILIER GUINÉE' hero
Type filters visible: TOUT, VENTE, ACHAT, LOCATION
VENTE filter filters only vente properties
Property card (data-testid=property-card) displays price in GNF and VENTE badge
Property card shows 'Voir détails' and 'Contacter' buttons
Property detail page /immobilier/:id loads correctly
Image gallery section visible (shows 'Aucune photo disponible' placeholder)
Seller info section visible with name, phone, WhatsApp, Email
Leaflet map visible with marker showing Conakry location
Reserve button (data-testid=reserve-btn) visible for disponible properties
Clicking Reserve without auth shows 'Connectez-vous pour réserver' toast
Payment modal (data-testid=payment-modal) opens after login + click Reserve
Payment methods visible: Orange Money, Mobile Money, Paycard, Carte Bancaire
Orange Money payment with phone number generates GIMO-XXXXX reference
Success modal 'Réservation effectuée!' shows reference
/connexion?tab=register opens registration tab directly
Agent immobilier button (data-testid=role-agent-btn) selectable on register
/immobilier/publier accessible for agent with full form
Publish form has sections: Informations principales, Localisation, Contact, Photos
/mes-annonces shows agent's properties with edit/delete actions
/admin/paiements accessible for admin with payments table
Payments table shows GIMO references and Confirmer/Annuler actions

seed_data_creation: Test properties and payments created during tests were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Immobilier section fully tested. Villa 4 chambres à Kipé (500M GNF) is the test property with status 'réservé'. Payment simulation works with all 4 methods. Admin can view/manage payments at /admin/paiements.

mocked_apis.payment_processing: MOCKED - Payment is simulated, generates GIMO reference but no real money transfer occurs
